text: Hey guys, what's up? I'm just starting out as a Developer at HubSpot, and I'm facing a challenge. Is it possible to incorporate a calculator via Java-Script into the form so that requests are 100% touchless directly from the CMS? If you can help me with tips or just your opinion, I'd be very grateful!

Mind expanding on what you mean when you say “requests are 100% touchless directly from the CMS”?

• What kind of calculator? 
• What requests? 
    ◦ Are you submitting the form using JS? 
• What does “touchless” mean here?
